name: ANKLID's Last Soul
description:
Just a little game from a little person
I've lost all sense of doing this
It is mentally difficult, sometimes there are so many ideas that you get lost in them and drown, which makes you not want to even start
And sometimes you want to do something great, but the ideas are no longer there, and the fire in your soul has gone out
No one around me is interested in what I do and what I want to devote my life to.
In my country, if you work with your head or just at the computer, and not with your hands, then you are lazy and do not deserve respect and support
I just want to make games for the soul, and I dream that at least someone will like them
Or maybe someone loved them
And I will be happy...

When creating this game, I imagined the greatest warior on earth, who died because of a stupid accident, or a vile betrayal
His soul and will were so strong that he simply could not allow them to drag him to hell
